pushto.ui¶

User interface.

Provides:

  • uInterface

class pushto.ui.uInterface(config_file, ctx=None)¶

The user interface class.

Parameters:

  • config_file (str) – name of configuration file with default settings

  • ctx (zmq.Context or None) – the zmq oontext, optional

>>> ui = uInterface();
>>> ui.splash()
>>> ui.main_menu()

The interface can be started with:

python ui.py

main_menu()¶

Go to the main menu of the interface.

splash()¶

Clear the screen and print the splash message.
